mapper.insert: insert into MainProgress (PROGRESSNUM, TYPE, MAXMEMBER) values (MAINPROGRESS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{type}, #{maxMember})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MAINPROGRESS WHERE PROGRESSNUM = (SELECT MAX(PROGRESSNUM) FROM MAINPROGRESS)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERLIST(LISTNUM, READY, PLAYERTYPE, USERID, PROGRESSNUM) VALUES(MEMBERLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'Y', 'HOST', #{userid}, #{progressNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOPGOAL WHERE TGOALNUM = (SELECT MAX(TGOALNUM) FROM TOPGOAL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARDNUM, USERID, TGOALNUM) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{tGoalNum})
mapper.select: SELECT userid FROM member WHERE userid LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT boardNum, b.userid, b.tGoalNum, t.tStartDate as startDate, t.tEndDate as endDate, tGoalTitle, m.maxmember FROM board b, topgoal t, mainprogress m WHERE t.tGoalNum = b.tGoalNum AND t.progressnum = m.progressnum AND boardNum = ( SELECT MAX(boardNum) FROM board )
SELECT MAX(mgoalnum) as mGoalNum FROM midgoal WHERE tgoalnum = #{tGoalNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO btmgoal VALUES ( BTMGOAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bGoalTitle}, 'N', #{period}, #{rankingId, jdbcType=NULL}, #{mGoalNum} )
mapper.select: select m.userId as userid from memberList m inner join mainProgress p on m.progressNum = p.progressNum inner join topGoal t on p.progressNum = t.progressNum inner join member b on t.userId = b.userId where b.userId = #{myId} and t.tGoalNum = #{tGoalNum} and m.playerType = 'HOST'
SELECT MAX(tgoalnum) FROM topgoal WHERE userid = #{myId}
SELECT MAX(progressnum) as progressnum FROM topgoal WHERE tgoalnum = #{tGoalNum}
SELECT t.userid, t.tGoalNum, t.tStartDate as startDate, t.tEndDate as endDate, tGoalTitle, m.maxmember FROM topgoal t, mainprogress m WHERE t.progressnum = m.progressnum AND t.tGoalNum = #{goalNum}
